body: Could you please verify that the presence of the extra broadcast expression does not affect performance in the trivial case? If it does, perhaps we should have a separate code path for that. This is a pretty performance critical op for many models.
body_html: Could you please verify that the presence of the extra broadcast expression does not affect performance in the trivial case? If it does, perhaps we should have a separate code path for that. This is a pretty performance critical op for many models.
